mapper.select: SELECT B.ID AS BOOKMARK_ID, B.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_ID, P.GENERAL_POST_CATEGORY AS CATEGORY, P.GENERAL_POST_TITLE AS TITLE, P.GENERAL_POST_CONTENT AS CONTENT, P.GENERAL_POST_VIEW_COUNT AS VIEW_COUNT, P.GENERAL_POST_LIKE_COUNT AS LIKE_COUNT, P.GENERAL_POST_BOOKMARK_COUNT AS BOOKMARK_COUNT FROM TBL_GENERAL_BOOKMARK B JOIN TBL_GENERAL_POST P ON B.GENERAL_POST_ID = P.ID WHERE B.MEMBER_ID = #{id}
